wikipedia_page.main: John Michael George "Jack" Lumsden (25 April 1927 – 22 October 2012) was a British modern pentathlete. He was the son of Lieutenant-General Herbert Lumsden and brother of Peter. He competed at the 1948 Summer Olympics.

response: * John Michael G. Lumsden (born 1927), better known as Jack Lumsden, British modern pentathlete
